divs: Sighting DetailsI left from where I go to take dual enrollment classes. I got on to state road 80 and started heading east. As soon as I got on the road I noticed a blinking light I figured it was some plane and didn't think to much about it. When I first saw the object it was about eight miles.I kept driving and the object seemed to be stationary and it wasn't moving. I got within a mile or so the object started moving at a cars speed. It was following the road and there was alot traffic going east and west. I saw the object had a blinking light on the top of it I figured it was probably a helicopter. I kept driving and then I noticed the object started to slow down a little. Then I driving right next to it and then I knew it was something else. It had the blinking light on the top and then it had five lights underneath it. The lights were going around in a pattern I have never seen before. About six to five miles away from getting on to U.S. 27 the object crossed the road and started heading north I turn to look at the road and I looked back and it was gone. I never got a good look to see what the object's shape because it was already dark outside.
